team.name: niccolo tani
team.bioHtml: Founder @Newtrition App • Worked at @Newtriton App

jobs.title: Developer or Co-founder for Android mobile app
jobs.description:
I am looking for a developer to employ or a cofounder with developers skils, possibly with mobile and website development skills to finish the last tweak and launch my new product "Newtritionapp"

you can view all the details about the product here:

Pitch - https://drive.google.com/open?id=1x5LJNSyElabrxEpyaVOVK8p3w-yb-FSi

Website - https://www.newtritionapp.com/

Changes needed - https://drive.google.com/open?id=1gcbEN0CIDlyKbMe5HOFsOETTH9lky8QA

App is developed in native,
Website with ROR

For more informations and details about the project contct me. 

best regards.

NT
